ModMetaData.name: Consistent Deep Drill Stone
ModMetaData.author: Evelyn
ModMetaData.description:
This mod changes the way the deep drill selects what stone to yield - instead of being entirely random based on what types are on the map, it uses the Consistent Map Stone mod to determine it based on where you placed the drill. You will have a much higher chance of getting the type of stone that you placed it on (80%) than the other types (20%).
Requires Consistent Map Stone mod.
